title: fix: preserve aspect ratio in klein-9b dimension clamping
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Fixed an issue in the Klein-9B model where non-square images were incorrectly forced into a square format.
gist.impact: Generated images now correctly respect requested aspect ratios like 16:9 while maintaining optimal resolution.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee stretching a digital canvas from a square into a wide cinematic frame. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
